label: applicableSustainabilityCharacteristic
comment: A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.

domainIncludes.comment: The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
The devices used to convey goods or other objects from place to place during logistics cargo movements.
Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted resulting from transportation.
An unused and rejected as unwanted component of transport material resulting from transportation.
